'''Clive Johnson''' is a man [[Maggie Pierce|Maggie]] met on Tinder.

==History==
===First Date with Maggie===
Clive and Maggie matched on Tinder and set a date. However, after a long day at work, Maggie forgot about the date and was surprised when Clive arrived to pick her up. Despite this, she declined a rain check and they went out on the date as scheduled. ''("[[1-800-799-7233]]")''

===Following Dates===
Maggie continued to see Clive. During a subsequent date, she received a text message, reminding her that she was missing dance class with Richard. She apologized to Clive, saying that it wasn't that she didn't want to see him, but she did have to leave. ''("[[Harder, Better, Faster, Stronger]]")''

===Game Night===
Maggie decided to host a game night when Meredith and Amelia asked to meet Clive. They played some games and had fun, but the night was ended when Clive's wife showed up. Jackson said they needed to work it out somewhere else and showed them both out the door, telling Clive to forget Maggie's address and to never call her again. ''("[[Games People Play]]")''

==Relationships==
===Romantic===
====[[Maggie Pierce]]====
He went on a date with [[Maggie Pierce]]. ''("[[1-800-799-7233]]")''

After the first date, they continued to see each other. ''("[[Harder, Better, Faster, Stronger]]")''

They continued to date until his wife showed up at game night, after which Jackson told him to leave and to not call Maggie again, effectively ending the relationship. ''("[[Games People Play]]")''

====[[Daphne Johnson]]====
He's married to Daphne, but cheated on her with Maggie, which she implied wasn't the first time. She tracked his phone and confronted him at Maggie's game night. ''("[[Games People Play]]")''

==Career==
He is a stock broker. Because of this, he doesn't understand when Maggie talks about medicine. ''("[[Harder, Better, Faster, Stronger]]")''
